header.title: Eurobot 2020 score simulation
header.author: Created by the {{- werobot }} team to help you!

buoysInColoredFairway.title: Buoys in the colored fairway line
buoysInColoredFairway.description: 1pt additionally per valid buoy on the fairway line of its color

buoysValidPairs.title: Pairs of buoys
buoysValidPairs.description: 2pts per pair of valid buoys on the fairway lines of one port. A valid pair includes one green buoy and one red

orientation.title: Anchor safely
orientation.none: Not in or in differents zones
orientation.onlyOne: Only one of the robot is valid
orientation.bad: Robot(s) are in the bad zone
orientation.good: Robot(s) are in the right zone
